short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple ad blocker with a beautiful UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fully undetectable ad blocker! MokaBlock will get rid of any of the ads and most trackers on your browser. It blocks the websites that supply these annoying things, which makes it undetectable so websites won't beg you to whitelist their site. 

This extension runs in the background of every page and will not track you at all. Currently there is a simple UI with a toggle button. There will also be a paid version containing many more features.
